title: why is the loading screen just not loading??

replies.body: I'd like to help out with this, but need some more info!  What are you seeing exactly when the loading screen appears?  Do you receive any error messages?  Is it completely black?  Anything can help.  Let me know!

I've been having what appears to be the same issue with the loading screen after champion select just not appearing at all and the riot  and the league of legends updater client running in my task manager but wont open. I've found that reinstalling works to fix the issue but its only until i close the client. So if i want to play i have to reinstall every day. PLS HELP
